condition.narrative: Finance Agreement : External auditor | Description :The Recipient shall recruit, not later than four (4) months after the EffectiveDate, an external auditor with qualifications, experience and terms of reference satisfactory to the Association, in accordancewith the provisions of Section III of the Financing Agreement

Finance Agreement :Strategic Environmental and Social Assessment | Description :For purposes of Part A.1 (d) of the Project, theRecipient shall, not later than twelve (12) months after the Effective Date, prepare, adopt and disclose a Strategic Environmentaland Social Assessment (“SESA”) of the Recipient’s tourism sector under the SESA Terms of Reference approved by the Association. |Due Date :15-Nov-2017
